# List of Symbols {.unnumbered}

**Do not remove the tags**! (they look like this: `%:::% tag %:::%`)

<!-- %:::% list-of-symbols body begin %:::% -->
For an extensive list of chronobiology related symbols, please refer to  @aschoff1965 and @marques2012.

$\tau$
: \hspace{20cm} Period of a rhythm in free flow; only revealed under constant environmental conditions.

$T$
: \hspace{20cm} Zeitgeber period.

$\phi$
: \hspace{20cm} Phase.

$\Delta\phi$
: \hspace{20cm} Phase shift.

$+\Delta\phi$
: \hspace{20cm} Phase advance.

$-\Delta\phi$
: \hspace{20cm} Phase delay.

$\Psi$
: \hspace{20cm} Phase relation.
<!-- %:::% list-of-symbols body end %:::% -->
